paper_abstract: We give an explicit representation for the time-dependent moments of a Markovian queueing system with reneging. Our expressions are comparable in form to the moment expressions for the M/M/1 queue found in Abate and Whitt (Queueing Syst. 2:41-65, 1987; Adv. Appl. Probab. 20:145-178, 1988). We also illustrate how to use these expressions to derive analogous moment expressions for a reflected Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process, with reflection at zero.
paper_title: On the time-dependent moments of Markovian queues with reneging
